name: Minimal Lyria Player for Render
description: A minimal example for real-time music generation with Lyria, using a Node.js backend on Render to handle API communication and audio streaming via SSE. The UI allows a single text prompt and play/pause.
prompt: Adapt the Lyria minimal player to use a backend server (Node.js/Express on Render) for API key management and Lyria communication. The backend should stream audio to the client using Server-Sent Events. The client sends control commands (play, pause, prompt) to the backend.
